main event: On 15-16 September 1967, an observer at Toledo Express Airport, Ohio, reported seeing a light in the sky, which appeared to be a navigation light, observed for 20 minutes.
interesting points: The object was in a slow motion or stationary pattern., Sparks were seen falling downward from the object before it turned off its lights., The object was not identified as a balloon in the morning paper., The observer described the object as brighter than car headlights., The observer was a military pilot returning home after a flight.
sighted object: a steady navigation light in the sky
witness description: A military pilot and a companion
